introduction: Tell me about your hometown.
What do you do in your free time?
Do you prefer living in a big city or a small town?

longTurn.topic: Describe a memorable holiday you had.

discussion: Why do people like to travel?
What are the benefits of traveling?
Do you think travel can improve one's understanding of other cultures?

introduction: What is your favorite type of food?
Do you like to cook?
How often do you eat out?

longTurn.topic: Describe a book you recently read.
points: Why you decided to read it

discussion: What are the advantages of reading?
How has technology changed the way people read?
Do you think children should be encouraged to read more?

introduction: Do you prefer indoor or outdoor activities?
What kind of sports do you enjoy?
Do you think exercise is important?

longTurn.topic: Describe a time when you helped someone.
points: How they felt after your help
Why it was meaningful to you

discussion: Why do people help each other?
What are some ways communities can support individuals in need?
Do you think people are less willing to help others nowadays?

introduction: What do you do to relax?
Do you enjoy spending time alone or with others?
How often do you take breaks during your day?

longTurn.topic: Describe a skill you want to learn.
points: Why you want to learn it
How you plan to learn it

discussion: Why is learning new skills important?
How can people stay motivated to learn?
Do you think it’s harder to learn new skills as you get older?

introduction: What kind of music do you like?
Do you prefer live music or recorded music?
How often do you listen to music?

longTurn.topic: Describe a concert you attended.

discussion: Why do people enjoy live music?
How has technology influenced music?
Do you think traditional music is still important today?

introduction: What is your favorite way to spend a weekend?
Do you like to plan activities or be spontaneous?
How do you usually spend your evenings?

longTurn.topic: Describe a movie you enjoyed watching.

discussion: Why do people watch movies?
Do you think movies have a positive influence on society?
How has streaming changed the way people watch movies?

introduction: What is your favorite season?
Do you enjoy spending time outdoors?
How do you prepare for different weather conditions?

longTurn.topic: Describe a time you experienced extreme weather.

discussion: How does weather influence daily life?
What are some ways people can adapt to climate change?
Do you think weather affects people’s moods?

introduction: Do you like shopping?
How do you decide what to buy?
Do you prefer shopping online or in stores?

longTurn.topic: Describe a gift you gave to someone.

discussion: Why do people give gifts?
How important is the act of giving compared to the gift itself?
Do you think people spend too much money on gifts?

introduction: What is your favorite holiday?
Do you celebrate any traditional festivals?
How do you usually spend special occasions?

longTurn.topic: Describe a family celebration you attended.

discussion: How do festivals bring people together?
Do you think traditional festivals are losing their significance?
How can people keep traditions alive?

introduction: Do you enjoy working with others?
What do you think makes a good teammate?
Have you ever been part of a successful team?

longTurn.topic: Describe a project you worked on.

discussion: Why is teamwork important?
What are the challenges of working in a team?
Do you think technology helps or hinders teamwork?

introduction: What is your favorite form of entertainment?
Do you prefer watching TV shows or movies?
How often do you go to the theater or cinema?

longTurn.topic: Describe a hobby you enjoy.

discussion: Why do people need hobbies?
What are some popular hobbies in your country?
Do you think technology has changed how people pursue hobbies?

introduction: What is your favorite app?
How often do you use your phone?
Do you think apps have made life easier?

longTurn.topic: Describe a useful app you use.

discussion: How have smartphones impacted daily life?
Do you think people rely too much on technology?
What are the potential drawbacks of using apps?

introduction: What is your favorite sport to watch?
Do you prefer individual sports or team sports?
Have you ever participated in a sports event?

longTurn.topic: Describe a sporting event you attended.

discussion: What are the benefits of playing sports?
Why do some people enjoy watching sports more than playing?
Do you think sports build character?

introduction: What kind of transportation do you use the most?
Do you prefer public transport or private vehicles?
How often do you travel long distances?

longTurn.topic: Describe a memorable trip you had.

discussion: What are the benefits of public transportation?
How can transportation systems be improved?
Do you think electric vehicles are the future of transportation?

introduction: What is your daily routine like?
Do you prefer having a set schedule or being flexible?
How do you manage your time?

longTurn.topic: Describe a productive day you had.
points: How you felt at the end of the day

discussion: Why is time management important?
What are some strategies for staying productive?
Do you think technology helps or hinders productivity?

introduction: What kind of books do you like to read?
Who is your favorite author?
How often do you visit a library?

longTurn.topic: Describe a library you have visited.
points: Why it left an impression on you

discussion: Why are libraries important?
How has the role of libraries changed over time?
Do you think e-books will replace physical books?

introduction: What is your favorite kind of weather?
How does weather affect your mood?
Do you enjoy seasonal changes?

longTurn.topic: Describe your favorite season.
points: What activities you enjoy during it
How it affects your daily life

discussion: How do seasons affect people’s lifestyle?
What are the advantages of living in a place with distinct seasons?
Do you think climate change is affecting seasons?

introduction: What is your favorite holiday destination?
Do you prefer beaches or mountains?
How often do you go on vacation?

longTurn.topic: Describe a place you would like to visit.
points: Why you want to go there
What you plan to do there

discussion: Why do people like exploring new places?
How does traveling broaden one’s perspective?
Do you think tourism has a negative impact on some locations?

introduction: What is your favorite subject in school?
Do you enjoy studying alone or with friends?
What motivates you to study?

longTurn.topic: Describe a teacher who inspired you.
points: What impact they had on you

discussion: What makes a good teacher?
Why is education important?
How has the role of teachers changed over the years?

introduction: What is your favorite kind of art?
Do you like visiting art galleries?
Have you ever tried creating art?

longTurn.topic: Describe an artwork or artist you admire.

discussion: Why is art important in society?
How can art influence people’s emotions?
Do you think art should be taught in schools?
